title: Advanced Prompting + Templates
description: Complex prompt patterns, template systems, few-shot learning, and prompt chaining

criteria.name: Correctness
criteria.description: Are templates functional and reusable? Do prompt chains work correctly?

excellent.description: All templates are fully functional and reusable. Prompt chains execute flawlessly. Few-shot examples are well-chosen and effective.

good.description: Templates work well with minor issues. Prompt chains mostly functional. Good few-shot examples provided.

satisfactory.description: Templates have some functionality issues. Prompt chains work partially. Few-shot examples need improvement.

poor.description: Templates don't work properly. Prompt chains fail. Poor few-shot example selection.

criteria.name: Code Quality
criteria.description: Template system design, code modularity, and maintainability.

excellent.description: Excellent template architecture. Modular, reusable components. Clean separation of concerns. Robust error handling.

good.description: Good template structure. Reasonable modularity. Some code reuse. Adequate error handling.

satisfactory.description: Basic template system. Limited modularity. Some repetitive code. Basic error handling.

poor.description: Poor template design. No modularity. Repetitive, hard-to-maintain code. No error handling.

criteria.name: Documentation
criteria.description: Template usage documentation, parameter descriptions, and chain explanations.

excellent.description: Comprehensive template documentation. All parameters clearly explained. Chain logic well-documented. Usage examples provided.

good.description: Good documentation. Most templates explained. Chain logic documented. Some usage examples.

satisfactory.description: Basic documentation. Key templates explained. Limited chain documentation.

poor.description: Minimal documentation. Templates not explained. No chain documentation.

criteria.name: Creativity
criteria.description: Innovative template designs and creative prompt chaining strategies.

excellent.description: Highly creative template system. Innovative chaining strategies. Demonstrates advanced understanding through novel applications.

good.description: Creative template designs. Interesting chain implementations. Shows independent problem-solving.

satisfactory.description: Some creative elements. Standard template approaches. Basic chaining patterns.

poor.description: No creativity. Direct copying of lecture examples. No original thinking.

allowedTools: GitHub Copilot for syntax help and code completion
Stack Overflow for template design patterns
Official API documentation and prompt engineering guides
prohibited: Copy-pasting complete template systems from AI tools
Using ChatGPT to generate entire prompt chains
Submitting AI-written code without understanding the template logic
aiUsagePolicy.guidelines: AI can assist with syntax and debugging, but template architecture and chaining logic must demonstrate your own understanding.

deliverables: Python file (practical2.py) with template system implementation
At least 3 reusable prompt templates with different use cases
2-3 prompt chain examples showing sequential reasoning
README.md explaining template design and chain architecture
learningObjectives: Implement few-shot learning with effective examples
Create prompt chains for complex multi-step tasks
Understand template parameterization and variable substitution
